website_summaries.verdict: A quality hammock with secure, high-end construction. It's a great choice for smaller campers - those with larger frames should look elsewhere.
pros: This model is more expensive, and it shows in craftsmanship
Nylon tafetta construction lets this sturdy hammock cradle up to 400 pounds
Comes with strong, quality carabiners and storage bag that's attached
cons: Purchase does not include tree straps
Single size may be small for some

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Used this hammock while on deployment and it held up wonderfully. Good comfortable sleep. I recommend the straps that they make to go with this hammock as well, but in a pinch they are not needed. The carabiners on both ends are sturdy and strong. The material is good quality and there was plenty of room to bundle up in this thing. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: lightweight and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great hammock and not very expensive. With hammock straps it's very easy to set up. The single nest is plenty big for someone 6' and 180 lbs. definitely worth it. the carabiners it comes with aren't the heavy metal ones like some hammocks come with, these are heavy duty aluminum ones that won't break ever and are lightweight. I also purchased the double nest, so can't wait for that one
customer_reviews.author: Brent b.

customer_reviews.title: You want the singlenest, not the doublenest
customer_reviews.text: For the longest time I had a doublenest thinking it would be the most practical. In reality trying to squeeze two people into one of these types of hammocks just isn't comfortable. The singlenest makes single person lounging so much nicer, and it will hold two people for as long as you can stand it.
customer_reviews.author: R.M.P.I.

customer_reviews.title: THE. BEST.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely incredible, best purchase I made this summer. Strong hammock about to hold me and my girlfriend together, just be sure to attach to strong trees nothing flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: maxnotmaxmaybemax

customer_reviews.title: ... for 3 years now and it is just as great as the first day when I bought it
customer_reviews.text: I have had this hammock for 3 years now and it is just as great as the first day when I bought it! I am about 5 '4 and this is the perfect size for me. If you are above 6ft/are bigger boned I might suggest getting the double just for a more comfortable experience! I am able to have someone else sit in the hammock with me although it is a tight fit and I wouldn't recommend it for a long period of time! If you are looking to sit with friends in your ENO definitely go for the double. That being said this single nest hammock has been great for me traveling and camping!
customer_reviews.author: ianne12

customer_reviews.title: Read the fine print- color not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: The color selections are misleading. I chose a majority teal hammock with a purple edge and received exactly the opposite. After going back to the product, the very last part says the colors may not be exactly as pictured. Bummed to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Scott

customer_reviews.title: High-quality ENO craftsmanship does not disappoint. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: My son asked for an ENO for his birthday. A few weeks later his younger brother wanted in on it too, so we bought this second ENO. While there are a lot of knock-offs on the market, I also knew this would be something he would use for many years to come - so we simply bought an ENO for it's high-quality craftsmanship, durable material, and wide range of colors. Thanks ENO for making a great product. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: TheProfessor101

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing! I am living in my RV for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing! I am living in my RV for the summer and couldn’t wait for this to arrive. My grandson came to visit and he thinks it’s the best swing he has ever been on. After my kids and 17 month old grandson visited I ended up buying better straps for occasions like that. I will probably buy another one that can handle more weight for next year to have two. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Janie Marie

customer_reviews.title: I liked it.
customer_reviews.text: Though they messed up my order and sent me a single instead of a double. I still checked it out. Really nice, but with a catch. If youre over 200lbs and taller than 5"10 I'd just suggest getting double. You can lay on it at an angle. Comparing the double to the single was what I got a chance to do, and as far as I can tell the only difference is the width. The double has lots of wide room, whereas the single you couldn't fit 2 people in unless they were sleeping hamburger style. I'd suggest getting some woopy slings or ENO straps too, unless you want to stay ultralight. Then 10ft of paracord will do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It literally transformed my “quarantine lifestyle” to a fun reading lifestyle this summer! I probably spent 2-3hours almost every day on my hammock reading and watching videos. It rained a few times and I left it outside, it dries so quickly!
customer_reviews.author: WendyYY

customer_reviews.title: Compact & Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: This is the third hammock we've ordered (for kid number three) for our kids to use at camp. They each have their own hammock and rigging gear. They are easy to put up and move to another spot (which the kids do themselves at camp). They pack up compactly and the storage bags are perfect. The single hammock is a great size (the first kid got a double & we like the single size better).
customer_reviews.author: The Great Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: Camping Essential
customer_reviews.text: About the size of a grapefruit, this hammock always has a place in my pack. It's lightweight, breezy and comfortable. I love the colors, and how if you so chose, you could purchase additions to use this for hammock camping. Only 4 stars because the straps aren't included, but I feel like they should be, especially since they are essential. I bought this knowing they would need to be purchased separately, but in the mean time, I attached p-cord to the carabiners with bowline knots. It works, but if you attach anything to the hammock's carabiners, it won't fit back into the bundle. Just a thought. This wasn't why I docked a star.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dehne

customer_reviews.title: No regrets.  Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I wish I had an easy way to mount it in my living room. It seems to be very generous in size. I recommend laying a sleeping mat on it to make it even more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: purchased for a teenager
customer_reviews.text: This hammock is holding up well with a teenager that takes it everywhere from vacation to summer camp. I recommend it. I also bought the straps which I recommend you include with your purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend buying this bran, more expensive but you get what you pay for when it comes to hammocks. Great product and very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: gina damuth

customer_reviews.title: Eagle Nest Outfitters for the win!
customer_reviews.text: This hammock is a dream. Pun intended. But all joking aside as an avid camper I wouldn't have any other hammock. It's comfy, spacious (I'm 6'2 and 185lbs) and durable. This has already made 3 trips with me and I use it in my apartment complex between trees when I feel like hanging out and reading a book. ENO makes quality products. Enjoy! Update: Years have gone by and I still absolutely love this hammock. Eventually added an Atlas suspension system (also by ENO) and they’ve made an already amazing hammock even better. Do it.
customer_reviews.author: SomeDumbPunk

customer_reviews.title: great hammock
customer_reviews.text: Perfect compact size allows for easy, lightweight travel. Folds down to about the size of a football. I'm 6'1" and it's a great length for me to be comfortable. Mine stays in my work bag to ensure a comfortable place to nap when long periods of downtime occur. My only recommendation would be to also purchase the straps to wrap around trees and such. The anchors on the hammock are more than long enough to wrap around some things and secure with a carabiner, but I've found that the straps add the extra length needed to wrap around larger objects without stretching the hammock too tightly.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Cant go wrong
customer_reviews.text: Camped 3 times in one of these, and they are great. They will hold you, though the first time you get in one you might wonder. After borrowing it from a friend enough times, I finally ordered my own. Other Thoughts: - you can use para cord 550 instead of the straps (lots cheaper) though the cord will stretch on first use - these can get really cold in the winter if you dont have something between you can the hammock other than the sleeping bag as wind goes right through it - a tarp is a must have! - very comfy to sleep in, and packs up very small and light
customer_reviews.author: D. Bartz

customer_reviews.title: exactly what i wanted
customer_reviews.text: i love this thing, it's exactly what i was looking for in a hammock. Stows away easily, and is very comfortable. The material breathes well, so you can feel even a light breeze. If i was in a part of the country that was cold, i might complain about how thin it is, but i'm in TX so for me it's a huge plus. pro tip - make straps out of paracord instead of spending 20 for the "official" ones. paracord straps are easier to pack into the pouch and there are lots of videos on youtube detailing how to make them.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Happy daughter
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses hers everywhere, she is a member of an outdoors club and they camp all over the southeast, she even sets hers up in her dorm room at college. She absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott F.

customer_reviews.title: ENO SingleNest Hammock
customer_reviews.text: Christmas present for my grandson who loves Scouts and camping. He set it up in his back yard (complete with the mosquito net from his aunt and uncle) and was very happy. I got the better straps which he said were easy to use. Now he needs to use his Christmas money to get the rain protector. He will use this hammock on his next camping trip.
customer_reviews.author: KSR

customer_reviews.title: question about cost?
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my granddaughter's birthday. Several other identical hammocks in different colors were less expensive by $10,(49.99) but I purchased this one for 59.99 because this is the color she wanted. When I received the product, there was a price tag on it for 49.99. So, why was it listed 59.99? Doesn't make sense to me.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Harris

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Hammock!  Comfortable, Durable, Large & Roomy.
customer_reviews.text: This hammock has traveled all over Europe and Africa with me, and is one of my favorite pieces of kit. It's easy to deploy (especially with the ENO Slap Straps), lightweight for packing and without fail "wows" everybody who sees and tries it. I don't deploy to any bush locations without this hammock. Depending on your location/operational needs, don't forget the ENO tarp and bug net. For the back yard after mowing the lawn, throw this up, grab a cold beer, and just enjoy 30 minutes of complete relaxation.
customer_reviews.author: Daddy X3

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!! Have used our ENOs of our children's ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!! Have used our ENOs of our children's before and loved them. Well, the three adult children decided mom and dad finally needed their own to enjoy. We look forward to using it on our camping trips to the mountains. May even get a second single or a double one so we don't fuss over who gets to use thus one!!
customer_reviews.author: M. E. Klinner

customer_reviews.title: ENO Best in the Business IMO
customer_reviews.text: I can not say enough on the quality, design and durability of ENO hammocks. Simply Put they are worth the money and in my opinion, the best out there for the price. I have used mine (This one is a gift) in places ranging from Canada to South America. Freezing Cold Nights do require some Extra ingenuity if you plan on staying warm. ENO Makes a Product to Secure a Therma Rest Pad in your Hammock. If you plan to hammock camp I do suggest buying one or your Therma Rest Pad will be on top of you by morning.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Elam

customer_reviews.title: Great Produce
customer_reviews.text: This is so, cool I love ENO hammocks. I use them so much I wear them out. I have used 2 of them and there great. I say buy them if you love to hammock camp as much as I do or just hang out in them like I do. That is part of the reson why I use them up This yr I had camped in them for 208 times and all over Missouri. Most of all in my yard and drive way.Yea, My drive way in a hammock stand I built. If you want to see the pictures my email address is mat_more74@yahoo.com or go to [...] Or better yet look up how to build hammock stands.
customer_reviews.author: M.Whitmore

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully light, pretty colors, not quite as wide
customer_reviews.text: I have only used once so far, but love the light weight and beautiful color (forest green and periwinkle). I hung it between two trees and used it to read and relax on a hot day. Would have liked a bit more fabric width-wise so that I could pull both sides around me. Otherwise, so far so good. Too soon to talk about durability.
customer_reviews.author: annie G

customer_reviews.title: Very nice - they sent the wrong item, but it's an upgrade, so that's ok.
customer_reviews.text: The hammock is really nice, and the price was a lot better than at REI. We already knew that the product is awesome. Although, just FYI, they accidentally sent the 'double' nest (the 'bar code' sticker says single nest, but the item and all labels attached say it's the double nest). I'm not complaining, since this is technically an upgrade... but just be aware that if e.g. you have a cover tarp, it may not fit this, since it seems that Amazon has the wrong bar code sticker attached?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compact and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: With a couple extra carabiners and a ratchet strap, you can hang this hammock practically anywhere. It is comfortable and compact. I slept in my hammock in the back of C-130s on long trips overseas. Stuffed in my motorcycle saddlebag, I took it on long rides and slept under a lean-to, comfortable and elevated off the ground. In both occasions, an extra carabiner and ratchet strap came in handy for a custom fit!
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Slept for 8 days in it and never going back to the ground
customer_reviews.author: Dominik

customer_reviews.title: I'm not certain what makes this better than one hammock or the other
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift for my brother. I'm not certain what makes this better than one hammock or the other, but it's what he asked for. The material looks sturdy enough and it is extremely compact when stored, so much so that it could fit into a side pouch on a backpack or bag. The package doesn't include either a frame or the straps required to connect it between two trees. Both systems are sold separately.
customer_reviews.author: Mixed

customer_reviews.title: Decent hammock
customer_reviews.text: Overall, a decent hammock. It’s pretty comfy and easy to hang, but pricey for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Bret M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for camping and hiking.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I love our hammocks. This is an outstanding product for the price and a wonderful option for any backpacker.
customer_reviews.author: BEN

customer_reviews.title: Small and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I’ve previously had grand trunk for years but opted for this one this time for backpacking haven’t used it yet but seems to be a good choice
customer_reviews.author: Tcroker

customer_reviews.title: even though the fine print said this was a possibility
customer_reviews.text: only gave 4 instead of 5 because the colors were reversed, with the predominate color being the olive toned. pic showed the reverse with grass green being the predominate color, even though the fine print said this was a possibility, I missed the blurb. my son was very disappointed but there was no reason to send it back as it is a very well made hammock.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It just arrive and I like what I see.
customer_reviews.text: After reading dozens of reviews I went ahead and ordered an ENO single and it arrived exactly as ordered; I intend to use it for the first time this week and I expect to be as satisfied as all the reviewers. However, what I don't get is how everybody apparently always have camp sites that have trees the perfect distance apart for hanging their hammocks; I hope that is the case for me but I will take my tent along just in case my camp site doesn't have the proper tree spacing. P.S. I ordered a forest green hammock so it would be semi-camo and not look like a piece of fruit hanging in the woods.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Not sold with straps
customer_reviews.text: Friend has the double version of this hammock and I intend to compare the single. I'm sure its a great hammock, but it didn't come with straps so now I need to wait for that. Will come back and edit later. Maybe place link to straps up front right next to photo of hammock.
customer_reviews.author: Bjm

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly lovely hammock, great for all outdoors needs.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup and so comfortable. I take this with me whenever I go camping or hiking. Haven't tried sleeping overnight in it yet, but so great to relax in, even the dog will sit in it with me from time to time. Great price for a good product. (I got mine for $55 here on amazon, much cheaper than the brick and mortar stores have them for.) Make sure to get some Atlas Straps or make your own.
customer_reviews.author: WASTELAND RAVENTop Contributor: Board Games

customer_reviews.title: Bought for 2 of our grandsons
customer_reviews.text: Was a great fit for a 12 1/2 yr old boy and 11 years
customer_reviews.author: Grammy

customer_reviews.title: Great Hammock
customer_reviews.text: Haven't actually gone out into the woods with this one yet but I'm quite familiar with the brand so if anything goes wrong with it I'm sure it will be a fluke.
customer_reviews.author: John Smith

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable sleep you will have
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable sleep you will have! Love it for camping. Durable, lightweight and takes up hardly any room. Use mine for motorcycle trips. Sure beats a tent, sleeping pad, etc. Have bug screen also. That takes getting used to putting up and using but it does work. Look up whoopie slings on Youtube and replace the tie off ropes on the hammock with the whoopie slings. Saves time and space. excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: plotthunter

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Amazing hammock I’m so happy with this purchase. Very durable and fits my 285 pound boyfriend perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Dianagoad

customer_reviews.title: How did we ever live without this before?
customer_reviews.text: I gifted this to my daughter but I beg her to let me borrow it every chance I get. I wish I would have bought this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: 100%MUT

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my kids. They are durable, easy to pack and set up and we’re worth the money spent after I shopped around and read reviews.
customer_reviews.author: janet prentice

customer_reviews.title: Third one bought
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand! This is the third eno I have purchased, this one being for my little sister. I have done camp ministry for 7+ years and this has been a great tool. May be expensive but this is a life time investment. You buy an eno, and you'll never have to buy a replacement (unless you actually make it your life goal to destroy it- had a friend accidentally knife his when his blade fell out of his backpack and sheath).
customer_reviews.author: Dot

customer_reviews.title: I'm just upset cause it's not like the image of the one I wanted
customer_reviews.text: They completely messed my order up I order a blue and charcoal single nest and ended up with a dark Navy/charcoal ( if they want to call it charcoal) center and a Royal blue outside ring. I'm just upset cause it's not like the image of the one I wanted..
customer_reviews.author: OneLazyBroski

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my teenage daughter's birthday and she loves it. I couldn't believe how small it rolls up to be. Very light weight but strong. The color is exactly as pictured on the website. The price was great for the quality of this product. I would recommend this hammock to anyone and would buy again . I also purchased the Atlas straps to. go with it
customer_reviews.author: Fish1991

customer_reviews.title: So good I had to get two ..
customer_reviews.text: Originally purchased as a gift for my wife - due to a shipping mix up we ended up with two. After using one of the for a weekend we decided we should keep them both so we weren't constantly fighting over them. Make sure to pick up some tree straps (I went with the slap straps from ENO). Very comfortable, even in the wind you can pull up the sides and get a bit of shelter. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Excellent buy! Could t be happier with this purchase. I use it all the time. Purchased in December and it has held up beautifully. Packs up easily and compact for storage
customer_reviews.author: Jaden

customer_reviews.title: exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: very reliable and color choice is awesome and very easy to pack
customer_reviews.author: an amazon ninja

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Hammock for Monkeys
customer_reviews.text: Man, do I ever love this hammock. I am 6'2" and about 230 lbs and this hammock is easily roomy and sturdy enough for me. Not to mention VERY comfortable. No more extra weight and fumbling with tent poles for me. I also bought thewhich makes setup of this hammock so quick and easy that a blindfolded monkey could do it in minutes. I wonder if monkeys like hammocks... That may explain my attraction to this one. Stop looking here. Buy this and you will be happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: xxxRIFFxxx

customer_reviews.title: This is the one you want!
customer_reviews.text: The hammock is great! It is strong and well made and looks really sharp too. I got it for my wife for our camping trips and she loves it. It sets up in under a minute and packs away into a fist sized sack thats sewn into the hammock. My daughter recently hung it up under her loft bed. Since it's so easy and fast to set up and take down - my son wants one so he can use it on campus for impromptu hammock-study breaks. I'm going to need a second one and maybe a third!
customer_reviews.author: David M Foster

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough nice things about these hammocks. Light weight, durable. I gave up camping in a tent. Good at the beach, in the woods, on your deck. I own several, and now I give them as gifts to my camping friends. Highly recommend the "slap straps" as well. For camping I recommend a double wide (wrap the excess around you to deter bugs). I could not be more satisfied with my purchase. worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: T. Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this hammock! Will have to update later regarding durability.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Carter

customer_reviews.title: So nice
customer_reviews.text: It's simple, this hammock is the bees knees. Slept in it at music fest, on a week-long kayak camping trip, multiple other times camping and in my own house. I have another handmade hammock from... somewhere in SA and though I'd say that one is more comfortable, it certainly isn't more versatile nor can it withstand my cats claws like this does. It's great. If you're going to make love on it, it's washable, so you're good to go. Do your thing.
customer_reviews.author: Zayd

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars, but read all
customer_reviews.text: I've had this hammock for about 4 months now and have had no problems with the hammock itself, but while using off brand straps they broke. also, the color I ordered had a base color of blue, one side green and the other orange, what I revived was the green and blue switched. Overall great hang and fun times
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Fun to use, I gave as a gift but I have one too!
customer_reviews.text: Fun in the outdoors, easy to carry and to hang
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: The best hammock
customer_reviews.text: After a year and a half of daily use is still going strong. I work for a non-profit where our participants sleep in hammocks and i can confidentely say this is the best and easiest to set up hammock. It is extremely portable, has some signs of wear but nothing to worry about. I expect this hammock to be with me for years and years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A family must have.
customer_reviews.text: A family must have, we now have 4 and we love them.
customer_reviews.author: Lenny Szumski

customer_reviews.title: Quality in small package.
customer_reviews.text: Given as gift. To date it has not been used so no comment as to satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Bergesch

customer_reviews.title: Great hammock, just something I learned
customer_reviews.text: Great hammock, just something I learned, sometimes the colors are switched from the picture, it turned out I like it even better that way but be aware that the pictured colors may be inverted.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: No straps. Don’t get tricked.
customer_reviews.text: This product does not come with utility straps for the trees. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Degife

customer_reviews.title: Quit wasting time and buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this almost four years and love it! We set it up every camping trip and there's always a line of people from our group waiting for their turn. I don't know how I only learned of the atlas straps last year, but buy them with your hammock so you can enjoy it even quicker. Just be careful getting in it - I've had some falls getting in it where it took me a few seconds to even realize what had happened! I only wish someone was recording me each of those times so I could laugh at it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Nathon Laws

customer_reviews.title: Fair Warning on the fine print !!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with what I received. My daughter picked out khaki/black with the item pictured being a black body with tan trim. What was received was a distinctly olive green body with black trim. While it states they try to conserve materials (which I support) and that what you receive may differ slightly, having rhe dominant color not be one of the two described falls short of my expectations. Why provide any opportunity to select colors if you get a random result anyway? Seems like exchanging it is just taking another spin of the color wheel.
customer_reviews.author: J. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Over rivers, at 10,000ft, its goes EVERYWHERE
customer_reviews.text: I finally upgraded from my last hammock to something that is compact, but still very comfortable. Both of those features are greatly met with this ENO hammock. Its insanely easy to set up, comfortable enough that you will just lay there for hours, and very easy to transport. I keep it in my "hammock" compartment in my CRV and its plenty small enough that when we went backpacking in RMNP recently it disappeared in my pack, thanks to its small packed size. If your looking for a hammock, you've found it!
customer_reviews.author: J. Hartlein

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs one!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I've ever made! I've had this for nearly 3 years, and use it daily. I've even managed to work it as a double on occasion. Perfect for hanging on my porch, and even taking backpacking (although I wouldn't recommend it for over-night use). I'd absolutely recommend this to others!!!
customer_reviews.author: Francesca

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hammock
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter wanted this for her birthday. Perfect size and color. Only thing I would say is that the description should have mentioned that straps are needed and sold separately on Amazon .
customer_reviews.author: Jill B.

customer_reviews.title: First was stolen in Ireland and held up great until then
customer_reviews.text: Second one. First was stolen in Ireland and held up great until then. I'm sure this one will as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Greatest thing I have bought for camping
customer_reviews.text: Greatest thing I have bought for camping. I love to canoe camp. Now with canoe camping weight isn't really an issue. But I love that I don't have to worry about finding a spot to camp. I can pull off water literately anywhere and find a spot. Its also the most comfortable way to camp in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: rmac52

customer_reviews.title: Eno is the best!
customer_reviews.text: Eno is the best! Got this for my boyfriend to match mine, and he loves it :)
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Boldt

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful and very versatile!
customer_reviews.text: I love my ENO hammock! It is very comfortable and can be used in several situations. The straps do not come with it but they are not advertised. You can buy straps from Eagle Nest Outfitters for 35 or so dollars, but I just bought 50ft of utility cord for 5 dollars and googled how to make my own. This product is really only limited by your imagination. I have hung it in many different places (tree, railing, hooks, frames, etc), and many different ways (hammock, chair, a mix of the two under my lofted dorm room bed). All in all, I would recommend that if you read this, you should buy it without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Shorter

customer_reviews.title: Compact, comfy and strong.
customer_reviews.text: I have only had the chance to use it a few times but I love it. I had a net hammock before and was disappointed with how much buttons and stuff in my pockets got hung up. Not an issue with the ENO. It feels a lot more secure too. Instead of feeling like I am laying on it, I lay in it. Really nice and sturdy. I love that I can have a bed and only carry something slightly larger than a softball.
customer_reviews.author: Hagemann Family

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: this is a great hammock. but I suggest you getting the doublenest cause it really doesnt weigh much more at all and the extra room is awesome. I was gonna send this one back but my son wants to start backpacking with me and he is only 6 so i figured this one is a great size for him because it will wrap all the way around him. I did through this in my pack last time we went camping and i left me doublenest hanging back at base camp and this worked great for when we stopped for lunch at the creek i could take a little siesta after we ate.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: great hammock
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for camping and a much more expensive net hammock for my backyard pergola but i have been using this almost every time. tie it up extra tight and sit on it and bounce a bit to stretch it out first then loosen the straps a bit and enjoy an amazing hammock. very compact and light i cant wait to take it with me to the mountains.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Burton

customer_reviews.title: My son found it quite comfortable. I haven't personally seen it in action and ...
customer_reviews.text: My son is a Boy Scout. It was suggested that we get him a hammock for camping trips. The hammock wasn't a requirement for the trip. He were given the choice between the hammock and the tent and chose the hammock. My son found it quite comfortable. I haven't personally seen it in action and will share that he is an 11 year old who weighs less than 100 lbs so I have no review from an adult perspective
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, easy to get in, easy to relax. It balls up to the size of a small softball and weighs nothing. It got wet and dried out quickly. I am a LARGE guy and this thing really held up to my use. It is also more stable than the hammocks with the large spreader bars. For the money well worth it, give it a shot you will love it. It holds up to 400lbs!
customer_reviews.author: WTK00

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I'm a very large guy and this holds me easily.
customer_reviews.author: collinsrhp

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this brand
customer_reviews.text: I think this hammock is one of the best out there. Very comfortable. My son uses it for camping on a regular basis instead of the tent. This brand is durable and high quality.
customer_reviews.author: janice g. lambert

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with this one.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these hammocks because my wife and I often take three day joh boat fishing trips down the local river and usually camp along the way. Finding a place to pitch a tent can be a challenge at times along the river bank. These hammocks solve that problem nicely. When used with a 8x10 tarp for a rain fly and a ridgeline they are comfortable and dry in all weather.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hall

customer_reviews.title: So much better than sleeping on the ground when it's good weather ...
customer_reviews.text: What a difference!! Camping essential! So much better than sleeping on the ground when it's good weather out. Def worth a bug net of camping, but I wouldn't get out of this thing :) recommended to me by my little brother Boy Scout, great job bro!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Love this hammock
customer_reviews.text: Love this hammock! I've been using it in the back yard through the summer and love that it is easy to compact into a small bag for storage. Super comfortable to lounge in as well, even when I'm using my laptop for writing projects.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bergstrom

customer_reviews.title: She loved it. Light weight
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to surprise my wife as we camped our way through the national parks in northern California and Oregon. She loved it. Light weight. Packs down very small. Well made. All around great product. The straps they sell separately are convenient but would be easy enough to make from rope if you want to save a bit of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loved it, Only place I have been able to ...
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loved it, Only place I have been able to find one in CAROLINA BLUE. Go Heels!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Cutler

customer_reviews.title: Finally got one!
customer_reviews.text: Well, its an ENO, so that speaks for its-self. Dont be fooled by the schmucks selling these @ festivals for $100.00 a peice. Buy them on amazon, this is the BEST price i've seen for ENO's. Super durable, and soft, 100% awesome. Going to buy another!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome hammock
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product best hammock I have ever owned it has comfort, strength, and packs super lite. I just got from a multi day back packing trip so glad I packed it along
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Hammock!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hammock for my son to take to Sea Base Boy Scout camp in Florida. Great product! Worked exactly as expected and made the camping experience fantastic as he slept under the stars on an island for a week. Only problem was some defective stitching found at end of week. Contacted seller and immediately got hammock replaced...no questions. Liked it so well that I have bought another for myself. We used Kammock Python straps and these worked great. Next purchase is to get the ENO rain tarp. A friend used this tarp on island and stayed dry on rainy nights even with some wind. ENO product is quality and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jones

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I love ENO hammocks. I didn't know what I was missing until I got one! Small and lightweight and very easy to set up and take down. In order to give 5 stars, I have to use something for quite a while and absolutely know everything about this product and know it's capabilities so that's the only reason I gave it 4. It is a great hammock and I feel it's definitely worth getting the slap straps rather than using some sort of rope or cord simply for the ease of use. Might eventually get a DoubleNest simply so there's more fabric to wrap around me and more space but the SingleNest has done just fine.
customer_reviews.author: B-Dubs

customer_reviews.title: Love mine......
customer_reviews.text: NetRush shipped this out FAST. I love the ENO hammocks, I have 2 - a single and a double, for when the GF wants to hang together..... Great for camping, the back yard, and it's my new backpacking favorite....light, comfortable, strong.
customer_reviews.author: Truthsayer

customer_reviews.title: Ya gotta hang
customer_reviews.text: I actually use a Hennessey camping hammock when I go on extended trips but I needed something more compact for a short trip in mild weather and no insects (it's California don't ya know). But this worked well, comfortable, stuffs into its own little bag and very light weight. Good colors too.
customer_reviews.author: Dead Mule, John

customer_reviews.title: You already know they rock (back and forth)
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and light. Been using them for years. No rips, no fading, nothing. They are quality tree beds right here!
customer_reviews.author: cody morgan

customer_reviews.title: ... a huge hit at Christmas and I was so glad for the various colors
customer_reviews.text: This was a huge hit at Christmas and I was so glad for the various colors. Each of the kids have a theme they are following. Good quality and strong.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Well made and colors are wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Made a 13 year old girl very happy. Will be using outdoors and on mission trips.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Wise Owl FTW!
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by a friend, Wise Owl didn't disappoint. Great hammock!
customer_reviews.author: G. Kohlmeister

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and packs small/light
customer_reviews.text: My husband hates sleeping on the ground due to his back, so he has taken this hammock on a couple of caming trips and lover it so far. Good quality and packs small/light. I've tried it out and it's obviously super comfortable. No sign of wear and tear yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Price

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and durable
customer_reviews.text: My daughter took it to college and carried it around in her backpack. Any time she had a minute and a few trees she was in it. It's easy to set up if you get the straps as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. Hammock
customer_reviews.text: This hammock is the best. Comfortable, light, cool looking, strong, durable. Have used it for about two months now almost every day, and it's definitely the best hammock out of all the guys I work with that have a hammock. Mine was the cheapest too! Good job Eno and Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend the double nest
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend the double nest, single feels cramped and it'd always nice to be able to share a hammock!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: All was not lost
customer_reviews.text: The shipping of this product was initially a problem, but the shipper was very kind in upgrading my order to a doublenest for no extra charge. The next order arrived promptly. It was easy to hang and even better to hang in! The hammock is light weight and very small when stuffed into it's attached stuff-sack. I can't wait to take it camping!
customer_reviews.author: cindogedog

customer_reviews.title: Top of the line in hammocks.
customer_reviews.text: What more could you ask for? ENO always delivers top quality hammocks. This is a SINGLE nest, so it is somewhat limited, where a double nest has more fabric= more possibilities. Lightweight, compact, durable, convenient, awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Guitarslim

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I been using this hammock for 5 years now and it hold up great. I used it backpacking, on collage campus, day hikes when I stop for lunch, and picnics. I love this hammock and would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

product_meta.title: ENO, Eagles Nest Outfitters SingleNest Lightweight Camping Hammock
feature_bullets: READY FOR SOME ME TIME: The SingleNest is the perfect hammock when you don't feel like sharing.
ADVENTURE READY: Weighing only 16 ounces, the SingleNest stuffs easily into attached storage bag. Packed Dimensions: (L x W) 4" x 5"; Unfolded Dimensions: (L x W) 9' 4" x 4' 7".

TRUSTWORTHY MATERIAL: Falling is not an option, unless it's to sleep. Made from 70D High Tenacity Nylon Taffeta, this breathable, quick drying nylon supports up to 400 pounds. (HAMMOCK STRAPS NOT INCLUDED)
MASTER THE ART OF LOUNGING: Includes Aluminum Wiregate Carabiners and nautical grade line that allows you to quickly and safely secure the SingleNest to trees, poles, boat masts, or even the wall.
PLEASE NOTE: ENO attempts to reduce potential waste by using every bit of fabric available in production, so the color and stitching of the your hammock might vary from what is pictured.
